description: Weekly laboratory classes involving synthesis, characterization of substances, and development of practical skills. Includes core skill competency requirements and non-core skill assessments.
9 weekly online quizzes testing fundamental principles from lectures and digital lessons. Best 7 results count toward final mark. Includes multiple attempts with feedback.
Two in-person tests covering course topics 1-4 (Week 5) and 5-8 (Week 9). Provides feedback on learning outcomes through exam-style questions.
Comprehensive online examination covering all course content including lectures, tutorials and labs. Features multiple question types requiring use of chemical drawing tools.
